finx.utils.task_runner¶

author: dick mule purpose: utils for running async tasks and gathering results

Attributes¶

NUM_CORES

Classes¶

ProgressManager

Manage progress updates for tasks

AsyncTaskManager

Class to manage running of multiple coroutines

AsyncProcessManager

Interface for running Multiprocessing tasks

ConcurrencyTypes

Enumerate various concurrency methods

TaskRunner

Interface for running a variety of async methods

utility function for determining progress message increments

  • chunk_size (int) – size of chunk

Returns:

chunk size or 1

int

None type object

static wrap_task(async_task: finx.utils.concurrency.Awaitable, task_id: int) → dict¶
Async:

Wraps an async task and makes it possible to retrieve results in order

Parameters:

  • async_task (Awaitable) – Awaitable async task to be wrapped

  • task_id (int) – Task id

Returns:

dict of task id and result allows for sorting

Return type:

dict

static wrap_tasks(tasks: list[finx.utils.concurrency.Awaitable]) → list[finx.utils.concurrency.Awaitable]¶
